pageContext.claim: “The Mainstream Media has NEVER been more dishonest than it is now. NBC and MSNBC are going Crazy. They report stories, purposely, the exact opposite of the facts. They are truly the Opposition Party working with the Dems. May even be worse than Fake News CNN, if that is possible!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's definition of "fake news" is that it is negative, not that it accurately reflects what happened. People in the news business have a different definition of fake news -- things that did not happen. Reporters do make mistakes, but responsible news organizations correct them. Reputable news organizations do not make up stories; it is a fireable offense.
